name: WeirdSpace (Veudeikouq)
description:
WeirdSpace is a game inspired by Star Control 2's super melee mode.

How To Play The Game

In, the game, you play as the rocket fella you see here. To control it, you press the Up arrow key to move forward, Left and Right to steer, and S to shoot a laser.

the rocket you control in all of it's glory.

But watch out! There are enemies which descend from the top of the screen. And they can hurt you (as you might expect). They also come in different colors. Here is a list of all the enemies with some info to go along with it.

All Enemies Blerkul

Blerkuls are the most simple enemy. They descend from the top of the screen and... well, that's it.

 Pointling

Pointlings are like Blerkuls, but faster and don't appear as often.

 Amphibash

Amphibashes are frog-like aliens. After reaching a certain position on the screen, They will change directions and go real fast. They hate it when you blast 'em, so do that as much as possible.
